original_title: Bing Crosby - Live In Mysen, Norway
overview: What was supposed to be a 40 minute performance gets extended another 20 minutes with 3 more songs to the already sung 35 songs in Bingâ€™s only fully televised concert! Recorded a month and a half before his death, we see Bing in great form performing many songs he was associated with. He is accompanied by the Joe Bushkin Quartet and his son Harry Crosby.
tagline: A 30 minute marathon medley performed by one of the greats of the 20th century!
title: Bing Crosby - Live In Mysen, Norway
